Blood magic isn't the only weapon the archdevas wield. They have an arsenal of weapons hidden somewhere nearby. Scouts are searching the area, but I need you to look near the demokron proving grounds. My people won't go near that place!

Find the armory and determine what all is inside."Tell me where you want me."
Go west past the hot springs, there's a river ending in a waterfall. You'll see the monstrosities there. The armory is likely near the training grounds.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm on it."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

, you found the armory, defeated the guard and monsters inside? Amazing!

I wonder what that odd stone thing was about...
